name: Block Breaker- Cloud City!
description:
Block Breaker - Cloud City! The perfect combination of breaking stuff and  relaxation! The tranquil music will really set the mood.  Break all the blocks to move on to the next Cloud City.  Each level will increase in difficultly! 

Instructions: Launch the ball at the start of each level by clicking the left clicker of the mouse! Move the paddle left and right with the mouse. 

There is more to be done to this game. Currently if you "die" you must restart from the very beginning of the game. 

Future updates/ additions: The ability to pause and access to start/quit menu. Special effects and new levels. 

Music Used:

 " Interstellar" by PlayOnLoop.com
